name: Ahoy Matey
description:
COMING SOON

Challenge your friends in multiplayer ship battles over LAN.

Currently in BETA
-Basic systems in place, needs polish/balancing.
-Choose flag not fully implemented

Instructions:
-'New Game' will start a host server+client on the local network
-'Join Game' will join the first discovered server on the local network

-Tap or click the compass in the lower right corner to set your
-Raise/Lower sails between None, Half, and Full
-Ship's flag indicates wind direction, cannot sail directly into the wind.
    -Wind direction will  change periodically.

-Running aground will wreck your ship.
-Collision will another ship causes damage based on speed of impact.
